mapper.insert: INSERT INTO healing_music (userNumber, title, content, imagePath, videoLink, createdDate, likes) VALUES ( #{userNumber}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imagePath}, #{videoLink}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT hm.musicId, hm.imagePath, hm.title, m.nickname, hm.createdDate FROM healing_music hm JOIN member m ON hm.userNumber = m.userNumber
